suite.name: Orangehrm Teste

test.name: casos de teste 01 - Acessar/logar site orangehrm

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout that is used by various keywords.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Location Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL contains ``expected``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Log
kw.arg: Tirando print da tela após clicar no campo Admin
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: Tirando print da tela após clicar no campo Admin

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: Teste para acessar e logar no site orangehrm. E somente acessar a tela de login e tela principal.

suite.doc: Essa suite testa o site da https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/. Realizando o cadastro, alteração, pesquisa e esclusão do cadastro de usuárion no menu Admin.
